statements: SELECT * FROM Recipe
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy'
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_time < 30 AND difficulty_level = 'Medium'
SELECT recipe_name FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard'
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_time > 30 ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_time < 60 AND difficulty_level IN ('Medium', 'Hard') ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy' OR (cooking_time >= 60 AND difficulty_level = 'Hard') LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy' ORDER BY cooking_time ASC, recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE difficulty_level='Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipe WHERE cooking_time_minutes < 30;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes, difficulty_level FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id=1;
SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY cooking_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipe ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC, recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipe WHERE difficulty_level='Easy';
SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY cooking_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipe WHERE cooking_time_minutes < 30 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT r.recipe_id, r.recipe_name, ur.user_id FROM recipe r INNER JOIN user_recipe ur ON r.recipe_id = ur.recipe_id;
SELECT DISTINCT difficulty_level FROM recipe ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipes ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10 AND recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, user_id, rating FROM user_ratings INNER JOIN recipes ON user_ratings.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipe;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_category FROM ingredient;
SELECT * FROM recipe_ingredient WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT user_id, favorite_recipe_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipe ORDER BY cooking_time DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name FROM recipe JOIN recipe_ingredient ON recipe.recipe_id = recipe_ingredient.recipe_id JOIN ingredient ON ingredient.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredient.ingredient_id;

SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipe JOIN recipe_ingredient ON recipe.recipe_id = recipe_ingredient.recipe_id JOIN ingredient ON ingredient.ingredient_id = recipe_ingredient.ingredient_id WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard';
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipe WHERE cooking_time < 30 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe ORDER BY cooking_time ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, SUM(cooking_time) AS total_cooking_time FROM Recipe GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT r.recipe_name, i.ingredient_name, ri.quantity FROM Recipe r INNER JOIN RecipeIngredient ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id INNER JOIN Ingredient i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe ORDER BY cooking_time DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.recipe_name, ri.quantity FROM User u INNER JOIN UserRecipe ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN Recipe r ON ur.recipe_id = r.recipe_id INNER JOIN RecipeIngredient ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';

SELECT i.ingredient_name, SUM(ri.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Ingredient i INNER JOIN RecipeIngredient ri ON i.ingredient_id = ri.ingredient_id GROUP BY i.ingredient_name HAVING SUM(ri.quantity) > 10;

SELECT r.recipe_name, u.username FROM User u INNER JOIN UserRecipe ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN Recipe r ON ur.recipe_id = r.recipe_id WHERE ur.rating > 3 AND ur.favorite = TRUE ORDER BY r.recipe_name ASC;
